Class LocalTernaryPattern

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.image.feature.dense.binarypattern.LocalTernaryPattern
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    @Reference(type=Article,
           author={"Tan, Xiaoyang","Triggs, Bill"},
           title="Enhanced local texture feature sets for face recognition under difficult lighting conditions",
           year="2010",

public class LocalTernaryPattern
extends Object
implements ImageAnalyser<FImage>
    Implementation of a Local Ternary Pattern.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Constructor Detail

      • LocalTernaryPattern

        public LocalTernaryPattern(float radius,
                           int samples,
                           float threshold)
        Construct an LTP extractor with the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        radius - the radius of the sampling circle
        samples - the number of samples around the circle
        threshold - the threshold

    • Method Detail

      • calculateLTP

        public static int[][][] calculateLTP(FImage image,
                                     float radius,
                                     int samples,
                                     float threshold)
        Calculate the LBP for every pixel in the image. The returned array of LBP codes hase the same dimensions as the image. Samples taken from outside the image bounds are assumed to have the value 0.
        Parameters:
        image - the image
        radius - the radius of the sampling circle
        samples - the number of samples around the circle
        threshold - the threshold
        Returns:
        three 2d-arrays of the positive and negative binary LTP codes and the ternary code for every pixel

      • calculateLTP

        public static int[] calculateLTP(FImage image,
                                 float radius,
                                 int samples,
                                 float threshold,
                                 int x,
                                 int y)
        Calculate the LTP for a single point. The point must be within the image.
        Parameters:
        image - the image
        radius - the radius of the sampling circle
        samples - the number of samples around the circle
        threshold - the threshold
        x - the x-coordinate of the point
        y - the y-coordinate of the point
        Returns:
        the LTP code (positive and negative binary code and ternary code)

      • calculateLTP

        public static int[] calculateLTP(FImage image,
                                 float radius,
                                 int samples,
                                 float threshold,
                                 Pixel point)
        Calculate the LTP for a single point. The point must be within the image.
        Parameters:
        image - the image
        radius - the radius of the sampling circle
        threshold - the threshold
        samples - the number of samples around the circle
        point - the point
        Returns:
        the LTP code (positive and negative binary code and ternary code)
